title: AI Chatbot Application
description: A full-stack AI chatbot application that allows users to interact with an intelligent conversational model in real time. The system handles user input, processes prompts via backend APIs, and delivers accurate AI-generated responses with a clean and responsive interface.

title: AI Image Generator
description: An AI-based image generation platform where users can create images from text prompts. The application manages prompt validation, API requests, and dynamic image rendering, delivering visually rich outputs through a modern web interface.

title: Amazon Clone
description: A frontend clone of Amazon's homepage built to replicate core UI components, layout structure, and interactive elements. This project focuses on responsive design, clean layouts, and JavaScript-driven user interactions.
